task.title: Manipulate Data with the Expression Evaluator
task.shortdesc: Let's use an Expression Evaluator to merge the longitude and latitude information into a single pickup location field. We'll also calculate the basic trip revenue by subtracting the tip from the total fare.

step.cmd: Add an Expression Evaluator to the canvas and connect the Field Converter to the stage.
On the Expressions tab, enter the following information to generate pickup location data:

ul.li: For the Output Field property, enter "/pickup_location".

For Expression property, enter the following expression:${record:value('/pickup_latitude')}, ${record:value('/pickup_longitude')}
This returns the data from the two flattened fields in the following format: <pickup latitude>, <pickup longitude>.

step.cmd: To add another expression, click the Add icon and enter the following information to generate a trip revenue with no taxes or tolls:

ul.li: For the Output Field property, enter "/trip_revenue".
